TRAIT_DESC_CONSTRUCTION: This building can create new units.
TRAIT_DESC_EXTRACTOR: This unit can extract resources from ore deposits.
TRAIT_DESC_HIGH_ALTITUDE: This unit can fly in restricted airspace.
TRAIT_DESC_UNFAIR: This unit can cloak anywhere. Truly unfair. (May also come with bugs)
TRAIT_DESC_BULLDOZE: This unit deals double damage if the enemy is at full health.
TRAIT_DESC_ANNIHILATE: This unit deals double damage if it is at full health.
TRAIT_DESC_BLITZ: This unit deals +20% damage if it attacks first.
TRAIT_DESC_CLEAR_SHOT: This unit can only fire in a straight line.
TRAIT_DESC_OVERHEAT: This unit loses 10% health every time it attacks.
TRAIT_DESC_TRACKING: This unit immediately attacks any enemy it uncovers.
TRAIT_DESC_SLUGGER: This unit always counters with full power.
TRAIT_DESC_JAMMER: This unit blocks air traffic and disables stealth.
TRAIT_DESC_ELUSIVE: This unit can move again if it has not attacked.
TRAIT_DESC_RADAR: This unit uncovers stealth units every turn.
TRAIT_DESC_STEALTH: This unit goes invisible after moving.
TRAIT_DESC_SUBMERGED: This unit cannot be attacked by most units.
TRAIT_DESC_COMMANDO: This unit is immune to logistical challenges.
TRAIT_DESC_CRAB: This unit can cross water and land, but it is NOT a crab.
TRAIT_DESC_STEER: This unit receives less damage from heavy ships.
TRAIT_DESC_SCHWERPUNKT: This unit deals +40% damage against infantry if it attacks first.
TRAIT_DESC_BEWEGUNGSKRIEG: Can act again if a target was destroyed (once per turn).
TRAIT_DESC_MOBILE_BATTERY: Cannot be counterattacked by ranged units.
TRAIT_DESC_STREAMLINED: Can be deployed further from the base.
TRAIT_DESC_DISPERSION: This unit damages friend or foe in a 3x3 area.
TRAIT_DESC_SUPPLY_DISTRIBUTION: Its action replenishes the strength of allied units
TRAIT_DESC_FIXED: This units survival does not prevent defeat.
TRAIT_DESC_STREAMBLAST: Strikes all foes in a direct line.
TRAIT_DESC_HEROIC: This unit cannot die, unless it is at 1HP.
TRAIT_DESC_NAVAL_TRANSPORT: Not a very fast method of transporting units, but it will carry anything.
TRAIT_DESC_AIR_TRANSPORT: The fastest transport, but can easily be shot down.
TRAIT_DESC_UNBUILT: This unit has not yet been constructed.
TRAIT_DESC_ABSORBER: Recovers HP based on damage dealt.
TRAIT_DESC_LYNCHPIN: Keep at least one lynchpin alive to stay in the fight.
